00038 void FilterLowPass :: init()
00039 {   
00040 
00041     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameOperand1);
00042     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameOperand1] = aw::gTypeMono;
00043 
00044     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameRate);
00045     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameRate] = aw::gTypeMono;
00046 
00047     // setup some default generators 
00048     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameOperand1, 0,
00049                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00050     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 220,
00051                     aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00052 
00053     reset();
00054 }

00071 // =============================================================================
00072 double FilterLowPass :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00073 {
00074     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00075 
00076     value_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand1]->getValueAtSample(st);
00077     fqCutoff_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRate]->getValueAtSample(st);
00078 
00079     fqCutoff_ = getValueWithContextToFrequency(fqCutoff_, aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00080 
00081 //     if (st % 4410 == 0) {
00082 //         std::cout << "sample time: " << (aw::SampleTimeType) sampleTime << " fqCutoff_: " << fqCutoff_ << std::endl;
00083 //         };
00084 
00085     fqCutoff_ *= 2.0 * aw::pi;
00086 
00087     w_ = 2.0 * sr_;
00088     norm_ = 1.0 / (fqCutoff_ + w_);
00089     b1_ = (w_ - fqCutoff_) * norm_;
00090     a1_ = a0_ = fqCutoff_ * norm_;
00091 
00092     value_ = value_*a0_ + zNeg1_*a1_ + zNeg1_*b1_;
00093     zNeg1_ = value_;
00094 
00095     return value_;
00096 };

00100 // http://www.musicdsp.org/showone.php?id=117
00101 // void SetLPF(float fCut, float fSampling)
00102 // {
00103 //     float w = 2.0 * fSampling;
00104 //     float Norm;
00105 // 
00106 //     fCut *= 2.0F * PI;
00107 //     Norm = 1.0 / (fCut + w);
00108 //     b1 = (w - fCut) * Norm;
00109 //     a0 = a1 = fCut * Norm;
00110 // }
00111 // 
00112 
00113 // out[n] = in[n]*a0 + in[n-1]*a1 + out[n-1]*b1;
00114 // 
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118 // r  = rez amount, from sqrt(2) to ~ 0.1
00119 // f  = cutoff frequency
00120 // (from ~0 Hz to SampleRate/2 - though many
00121 // synths seem to filter only  up to SampleRate/4)
00122 // 
00123 // The filter algo:
00124 // out(n) = a1 * in + a2 * in(n-1) + a3 * in(n-2) - b1*out(n-1) - b2*out(n-2)
00125 // 
00126 // Lowpass:
00127 //       c = 1.0 / tan(pi * f / sample_rate);
00128 // 
00129 //       a1 = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + r * c + c * c);
00130 //       a2 = 2* a1;
00131 //       a3 = a1;
00132 //       b1 = 2.0 * ( 1.0 - c*c) * a1;
00133 //       b2 = ( 1.0 - r * c + c * c) * a1;
